class.name: gsplines_moveit/MinimumSobolevSeminormAdapter
class.description: Computes the trajectory that minimizes the given sobolev seminorm and passes trough a set of points

class.name: gsplines_moveit/MinimumJerkAdapter
class.description: Computes the minimum jerk trajectory passes trough a set of points

class.name: gsplines_moveit/MinimumSnapAdapter
class.description: Computes the minimum snap trajectory passes trough a set of points

class.name: gsplines_moveit/MinimumCrankAdapter
class.description: Computes the minimum crank trajectory passes trough a set of points
